btrplace.solver.choco.view

Interface ChocoView

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    AliasedCumulatives, Cumulatives
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CPowerView, CShareableResource, DefaultAliasedCumulatives, DefaultCumulatives, DefaultPacking, Packing

    public interface ChocoView
    Interface denoting the Choco implementation of a View. Such a view might be generated from a ModelView thanks to the ChocoModelViewBuilder or might be a solver-only view provided through ChocoReconfigurationAlgorithmParams.
    Author:
    Fabien Hermenier

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean beforeSolve(ReconfigurationProblem rp)
      An event that is send to indicate a RP will be solved.
      boolean cloneVM(VM vm, VM clone)
      Notify a new VM will be a clone of an already known VM.
      String getIdentifier()
      Get the view unique identifier.
      boolean insertActions(ReconfigurationProblem rp, ReconfigurationPlan p)
      Allow the insertion of actions on the plan computed for a given problem.

    • Method Detail

      • getIdentifier

        String getIdentifier()
        Get the view unique identifier.
        Returns:
        a non-empty String

      • beforeSolve

        boolean beforeSolve(ReconfigurationProblem rp)
             throws SolverException
        An event that is send to indicate a RP will be solved. The view can then customize the RP a last time.
        Returns:
        false iff there will be no solution to the RP.
        Throws:
        SolverException - if an error occurred while building the problem

      • insertActions

        boolean insertActions(ReconfigurationProblem rp,
                      ReconfigurationPlan p)
        Allow the insertion of actions on the plan computed for a given problem.
        Parameters:
        rp - the solver problem
        p - the computed plan
        Returns:
        true iff the insertion succeeded

      • cloneVM

        boolean cloneVM(VM vm,
                VM clone)
        Notify a new VM will be a clone of an already known VM.
        Parameters:
        vm - the old VM that will be substituted by the clone
        clone - the clone identifier
        Returns:
        true iff the view validate the cloning process.
